name: Negative Space (itch) (Morgan Creek)
description:
Negative Space is a first-person 3D walking simulator that takes you through an abstract colorless environment while you search for something that you lost. Complete ten different puzzle-oriented levels before deciding if you've found what's missing.

-----

WASD + Mouse to move/look

SPACE to continue

R to reset level

Q to quit game

-----

(This game is a work in progress).
